summary: Morrowind-themed weapons pack with a lot of new, non-replacement weapons.
descriptionHtml:
Note: I\'m not creating or updating mods anymore. Because of this, I give anyone permission to continue this project, make variations of it, or include it in their own files. 

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12892 ]\"Official\" continuation mod by masterofshadows[/url]

[url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/27273749/Weaponsof3E%20Readme.html]Readme.[/url]

files.name: Version 1_2 full
files.changelogHtml:
Existing silver weapons now have the prefix \"Perfect\" to reflect their crafting recipes, and standard silver weapons can now be crafted without flawless gems.
Re-balanced silver weapons.
Fixed blood meshes for all weapons.
Changed form IDs of the STAT records, this might have been causing some of the invisible weapons problems.
Added new smithing recipes for silver nodachi, katana, wakizashi, and tanto.
Modified/improved the textures of some weapons.
No leveled lists ESP and texture options are now in the main download.
Slightly increased probability of some 3E weapons appearing in some leveled lists.
Fixed a few crafting recipes that used the wrong materials or were missing materials.

files.name: Weapons of the Third Era 1_3
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed physics meshes for all weapons.
Slightly modified proportions of longsword models
Fixed inverted normal maps on silver weapons.
All staves and clubs can be improved now.
Removed \"ebony claw\" from Daedric staff recipe, it wasn\'t supposed to be there.
Added a \"sheath\" to back-carried swords.
Added a \"sheath\" to a few more one-handed weapons.
New HTML readme based on my Realistic Lighting readme design.
Form ID list is back!
